Description:
Detailed design and project delivery (const, engineering, & project control): Manage the engineering team to ensure specs and detailed design are as planned and according to regulations. 
Lend technical expertise to ensure smooth translation of master plan into design. 
Recommend design standards that ensure cost-effectiveness and innovation 
Approve horizontal/ vertical designs after making sure they adhere to the master plan. 
Decide on any changes to the master plan once the design phase is underway â€“ approve mission-critical changes and draw plans to minimize cost and time effects. 
Manage the construction team to ensure the contractor delivers the project according to the specific design specs, timeline, and budget. 
Oversee 3rd party work on construction. 
Manage the project controls to ensure the project is delivered according to schedule, timeline, and quality. 
Ensure budgetary, and schedule compliance of projects. 
Cross-communication between construction, engineering, and project controls. 
Decide on committing internal resources based on department labor standards and benchmarks. 
Review and recommend project timelines, and make capital and resource decisions as projects hit critical milestones. 
Set up a triage process to address any slippage in schedule or cost overruns, and mitigate the financial impact on the landed cost of the project. 
Escalate issues regarding changes to project timeline or cost to Manager, Landscape & Utilities Projects 
Develop accurate project costing estimates for new projects, and feed  information to property development for initial studies/design 
Decide on committing delivery resources based on department labor standards and benchmarks 
Define in agreement with procurement project requirements Skills
Skills:
10 years of experience in Real Estate delivery with large developers, multi-asset classes sizeable annual profits, and in-depth knowledge of GCC.
Bachelor's degree in civil/structural, civil engineering or architecture or Mechanical.
Proven ability to successfully deliver (on cost, on time, and on specs) high-profile and multiple concurrent projects.
Profound technical knowledge (engineering) of real estate delivery processes, having managed at least one of the sub-functions directly
Demonstrated management skills, including relationships with 3rd party suppliers (contractors, consultants, etc.)
